IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.delete_character') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.delete_character GO
-- error_code_out: -- 0: succeeded -- *: DB error CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.delete_character @guild_id dbo.id_t OUTPUT, @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @ec INT SET @ec = 0
BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE dbo.Characters SET delete_on = 1, delete_on_at = GETDATE() WHERE id = @character_id
UPDATE dbo.Auctions SET seller_id = 0 WHERE seller_id = @character_id
SELECT @guild_id = guild_id FROM dbo.Guild_Members WHERE character_id = @character_id
COMMIT END TRY BEGIN CATCH SET @ec = ERROR_NUMBER() IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK END CATCH
SET NOCOUNT OFF
RETURN (@ec)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
